root.name: Divi-Dead
root.description: Divi-Dead is a horror-themed eroge (erotic) Visual Novel developed for the PC by C's Ware. Released in 1998, the game is considered an influence on other horror-themed erotic titles such as Bible Black, which spawned the infamous hentai series of the same name. The game was later ported to the PSP and Sega Dreamcast by homebrew studio Tales Translations in 2008, and translations in both English and Spanish exist.SynopsisProtagonist Ranmaru Hibikiya is a transfer student at the prestigious Asao Private School. Given a scholarship to Asao by his uncle, the school's dean, Hibikiya serves as a narc of sorts, told to report any suspicious activities to his uncle. Hibikiya is soon plunged into a world of sexual depravity and violence that he may very well never escape from.
